meanings.definition: To decide or announce that a planned event will not take place.
meanings.sent1: She is cancelling the party due to bad weather.
meanings.sent2: The school is cancelling the field trip because of a scheduling conflict.
meanings.sent3: After cancelling the picnic, they decided to have a movie night instead.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds cancelling the outdoor concert were a disappointment to many.
meanings.sent5: The bride cancelling the wedding last minute left everyone shocked.

meanings.definition: To stop making or doing something.
meanings.sent1: He is cancelling his subscription to the magazine.
meanings.sent2: The doctor advised cancelling the medication due to side effects.
meanings.sent3: She kept cancelling her diet every time she saw a dessert.
meanings.sent4: The artist felt like cancelling the painting halfway through.
meanings.sent5: The team captain cancelling the play was a bold move that paid off.
